er-68df56a8135961401cbd590171d6b04a-min.css","js":"//assets.squarespace.com/universal/scripts-compressed/website-overlays-manager-0640cd6f4f1a05d3f2a98-min.en-US.js"}},"pageType":1,"website":{"id":"5a653a674c0dbf1ef5c92f88","identifier":"karolyne-judd","websiteType":4,"contentModifiedOn":1585606372706,"cloneable":false,"siteStatus":{},"language":"en-US","timeZone":"America/Chicago","machineTimeZoneOffset":-18000000,"timeZoneOffset":-18000000,"timeZoneAbbr":"CDT","siteTitle":"Inspire Academy","fullSiteTitle":"Inspire Academy","siteDescription":"
Hello lovely! my name is Karolyne and I'm 15 years old from Texas. I was born and have lived in Texas my whole life. I've been through a lot in my life from bullying to my anxiety. God has been my rock through all my heartaches and I feel he has led me to tell my stories and to encourage you to be who God made you to be. Some of the things I might also share are my calligraphy and maybe a little bit about sign language which I am currently trying to learn. I have a aussiedoodle/labradoodle puppy and her name is Brynlee so you might also hear about her. Thank you for looking a my blog and I hope you enjoy. link.title: RSS Feed
link.script:
{"url":"https://www.inspireacademytx.com","name":"Inspire Academy","description":"
Hello lovely! my name is Karolyne and I'm 15 years old from Texas. I was born and have lived in Texas my whole life. I've been through a lot in my life from bullying to my anxiety. God has been my rock through all my heartaches and I feel he has led me to tell my stories and to encourage you to be who God made you to be. Some of the things I might also share are my calligraphy and maybe a little bit about sign language which I am currently trying to learn. I have a aussiedoodle/labradoodle puppy and her name is Brynlee so you might also hear about her. Thank you for looking a my blog and I hope you enjoy. ","image":"//static1.squarespace.com/static/5a653a674c0dbf1ef5c92f88/t/5b54229370a6ad6dfdeddfae/1585606372706/","@context":"http://schema.org","@type":"WebSite"}

div.h3: Inspire Academy is a "safe place to learn" using differentiated and multi-sensory instruction techniques allowing for multiple intelligence and strength compensations. Our school services students diagnosed with Dyslexia, Dysgraphia, Dyscalculia, Oral Language, Anxiety, ADD, Gifted and Talented but learning challenged, Socially challenged due to struggles with learning disabilities.

li.p: 95% of all learning is inhibited when anxiety is present
17-20% of the country has some form of neurological developmental disorder
